title: "City of Tampa uses AI system to make roadways safer"
excerpt: "TAMPA, Fla. (Tampa Bay Now) - The City of Tampa is using a new technology to help keep drivers safe. City employees are now using AI to predict traffic patterns. \"It helps us to get responders out to incidents as fast as we possibly can,\" said Adam Robertson, city of Tampa employee."
